title: The Culling
description: In a post-apocalyptic world run by the demons of hell, it is time for the next Middle Born generation to leave their city and take a perilous journey to reach Nirvana.Promised safety from the darkness of this world, they are not prepared for what they are about to face both as a group and as individuals.Their worlds survival rests on their shoulders but all is not as it seems and they will be put to the ultimate test. “Ms Claven definitely knows how to write a great horror story. The Culling being her 4th published book is the best so far, in my opinion. “ Karen – Kazza’s Books Blog and Reviews
author: Sian B. Claven
